mapper.select: select hi.id, hi.food_id, ci.city_name, si.scenery_name, hi.food_name, hi.food_pic, hi.food_price, hi.food_desc, hi.create_time, hi.modified_time from food_info hi left join scenery_info si on hi.scenery_id = si.scenery_id left join city_info ci on si.city_id = ci.city_id

select hi.id, hi.food_id, ci.city_name, si.scenery_name, hi.food_name, hi.food_pic, hi.food_price, hi.food_desc, hi.create_time, hi.modified_time from food_info hi left join scenery_info si on hi.scenery_id = si.scenery_id left join city_info ci on si.city_id = ci.city_id where hi.food_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into food_info (food_id, scenery_id, food_name, food_price, food_pic, food_desc) values (#{foodId}, #{sceneryId}, #{foodName}, #{foodPrice}, #{foodPic}, #{foodDesc})
mapper.select: select scenery_name from scenery_info si where si.city_id = (select city_id from city_info ci where city_name = #{cityName})
select scenery_id from scenery_info where scenery_name = #{sceneryName}
